resources.string: What are you up for, Kate?
There are happening 87 events around you today.
Long time no see, folks! \nSince it has been already a year, we finally have a reason to meet up again. Join our legendary YF Aftershow Party for some boozy drinks & funky tunes. See you there.

string.u: Don\'t have an account? SIGN UP
